title: "Crowdsourced privacy-preserved feature tagging of short home videos for machine learning ASD detection"
excerpt: "We test the hypothesis that a trustworthy crowd of non-experts can efficiently annotate behavioral features needed for accurate machine learning detection of the common childhood developmental disorder Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) for children under 8 years old."
